text: The 2021 World Athletics Cross Country Championships will take place on 20 March 2021 in Bathurst, Australia. It will be the event's 44th edition and the second time after Auckland in 1988 that the event will take place in Oceania. In March 2020 the course was revealed.https://www.worldathletics.org/competitions/world-athletics-cross- country-championships/news/cross-country-bathurst-2021-course-map == References == 2021 World Cross Country Championships Category:International athletics competitions hosted by Australia Category:Cross country running in Australia IAAF World Cross Country Athletics World Cross Country Championships
title: 2021 World Athletics Cross Country Championships
